amendment.description: To make available from amounts available for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Defense-Wide, $2,000,000 for the development of integrated systems analysis capabilities for bioterrorism response exercises.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1233 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1233 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Roberts. (consideration: CR S9366; text: CR S9366) To make available from amounts available for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Defense-Wide, $2,000,000 for the development of integrated systems analysis capabilities for bioterrorism response exercises.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1233 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1233 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Roberts.
